name: Groove Channel - demo
description:
★ Welcome to the Groove Channel! ★

Groove Channel is a 2.5D retro-inspired rhythm game created as a senior project at Moore College of Art & Design. 

Description

Groove to the music! Hit the notes in time with the songs to rack up points! Explore animated stages and enjoy quirky, hand-drawn characters to play as!

Gamepad and Keyboard compatible.

*** *** CONTROLS: ***

Game made by:

Ariana Williams - @toastybroyt

*** TROUBLESHOOTING:

FAQ:

  • "The buttons aren't working!"

Try clicking the button with your mouse! And then on the next scene it should work just fine again.

If you run into any other problems, feel free to contact me!
